physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At 30 months: normal muscle bulk, hypotonia, hyporeflexia, weakness (4/5 muscle strength throughout), wide-based gait.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 53 months: bilateral wrist drop, finger contractures, decreased muscle bulk, microcephaly (HC 2nd percentile, 46 cm).

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: At 30 months: microcephaly, nystagmus, esotropia, pale optic nerve heads, diminished muscle bulk, wrist drop, hypotonia, weakness, hyporeflexia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 15 months: weakness (4/5 proximally and 3/5 distally), regression of motor milestones including loss of ability to stand and sit.
